sentences.en: Approximate solutions were found for the rate of growth of a bubble in the process of intumescence.
sentences.cn: 得到了膨胀过程中气泡生长速率的近似解。

sentences.en: At the frozen storage of 90 days , some of collagen micro - fibrils in stoma showed intumescence.
sentences.cn: 冷冻90d时, 基质中部分胶原微纤维肿胀.

sentences.en: Based on those experiments, a mathematic model of process of intumescence was established with the neglect of the transfer motion of the bubble.
sentences.cn: 在实验基础上，忽略气泡的迁移，建立了膨胀过程的数学模型。

sentences.en: There are lymph gland inflammation, malignant lymphoma and all kinds of metastatic cancer, which often cause intumescence of shallow lymph gland.
sentences.cn: 淋巴结炎、恶性淋巴瘤，各种转移癌常引起颈部浅表淋巴结肿大。

words.tran_cn: 膨胀的；肿大的；隆起的；泡沸的

trans.tran_en: a swelling up, as with blood or other fluid
